text:
Good afternoon! I am working on an HubSpot Theme. I made some changes to templates and modules. I published some wrong updates to “base.html” , so now I want to go back to the previous version of that file. If I try to right-click on “base.html” and click “Show revision history” on the popup, this error appears: “Woops. There was a problem loading the revision for ‘base.html’.“.
Had It ever happened to you?
Do you know any way to solve this problem?

Thank if you will answer!
I keep getting the same error today, really frustrating
